  • Constructor Details

    • Hexagonal

      public Hexagonal​(Simulation sim)
      Creates a GrowthVisualization2D for hexagonal simulations.

      Constructor uses the simulation object to determine the sizing of the arrays, which will then be used to rescale into pixel space for display.

      Parameters:
      sim - the simulation instance
